meanings.definition: Vids: Shortened form of the word "videos."
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching vids of cute animals online.
meanings.sent2: She shared some funny vids with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The vids of dancing cats always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her phone was a treasure trove of vids waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The vids of breathtaking landscapes took my breath away.

meanings.definition: Vids: Plural form of the word "vid," meaning a short video clip.
meanings.sent1: He uploaded several vids of his vacation on social media.
meanings.sent2: The website is full of entertaining vids for all ages.
meanings.sent3: Watching vids of people falling over can be oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The vids were like tiny windows into different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The vids captured the essence of the bustling city life.

meanings.definition: Vids: Informal term for videos or video content.
meanings.sent1: Let's find some interesting vids to watch together.
meanings.sent2: The vids on that channel are always so engaging.
meanings.sent3: His collection of vids was like a digital library of memories.
meanings.sent4: The vids served as a visual diary of their adventures.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the vids was truly impressive.
